preferences.accommodation: mix of hotels and staying with family
preferences.pace: moderate to relaxed, girlfriend needs jet lag recovery
preferences.special_needs: girlfriend Chinese A1 level, prefer English-friendly venues for independent activities
preferences.interests: cute things, trendy spots, authentic local food, INFJ personality - small/niche/fancy places, independent bookstores (English), cozy cafes, cute toy stores (like Popmart)

flights.route: Paris CDG T1 11:00 → Chongqing Jiangbei T3 04:40 (Feb 15)

accommodations.address: 花牌坊北街99号 / 西锦国际二期四幢四单元1902

accommodations.hotel: SK简奢·逅熙酒店 (南京路步行街店)
桔子酒店 (北京中关村学院桥店)

events.event: University orientation + move to rental apartment

user_plans: 04:40 arrive at Jiangbei Airport T3
Store luggage at Raffles Chongqing
Jet lag recovery - not too many attractions
Visit: 下浩里, 湖广会馆, cable car, 洪崖洞, Raffles observation deck, 龙门浩, 熹玥盒子, 李子坝站, drone show
Dinner: hillside hotpot restaurant with Chongqing city view
Massage after dinner (near hotel, fancy spa)
Check-in to Raffles Chongqing late evening
Depart 07:00 high-speed train Chongqing → Bazhong (need to book)
Arrive Bazhong, go to family home (半山逸城A区35幢1902)
Afternoon: spend time with family
Evening: Chinese New Year's Eve celebration with family
Morning: breakfast at 老五酱肉包子 (most authentic Bazhong breakfast)
Visit 南龛坡 or 望王山 (historical/scenic spot)
Pack and say goodbye to family
Lunch: 老七牛肉 (must-try local specialty)
Afternoon: high-speed train Bazhong → Chengdu (need to book)
Arrive Chengdu home (花牌坊北街99号)
Evening: explore Taikoo Li
09:00 arrive Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding
Spend 1 hour with pandas, then return
Visit Jinli Ancient Street
Try to cover: 明婷饭店, 牛丞丞 (和牛), 饕林 - fit in multiple meals
Return home, pack luggage
Flight CA4509: Chengdu Shuangliu 14:35 → Shanghai Pudong T2 17:20
Evening: arrive Shanghai, check-in SK Hotel
Night: visit Bund + Nanjing Road
Full day Shanghai city exploration
Visit: niche/fancy INFJ-style spots, cute toy stores (Popmart-style), independent bookstores (English), cozy cafes
Walk through People's Square area
Dinner options: Michelin restaurant OR 人和馆 (Michelin-recommended Benbang cuisine) OR Ajiya (Japanese BBQ) - orchestrator to schedule
Full day: Shanghai Disneyland
Free day - explore more niche/fancy spots
Remaining dining: Michelin / 人和馆 / Ajiya (whichever not yet done)
Shopping: buy fashion items/clothes if interested
Prepare for Beijing flight next morning
Flight MU5129: Shanghai Pudong T1 09:05 → Beijing Daxing 11:25
Check-in: Orange Hotel (中关村学院桥店) OR directly to rental apartment (TBD)
Afternoon: university registration
Evening: 舞剧《只此青绿》performance
Daytime: girlfriend's university orientation
Move to rental apartment
